description.en: Nako, a female high school student, who is shy with her modest attitude, has been a lover since her childhood friend Yoshida and junior high school. Refreshing and handsome Yoshida is popular even in his school years. "I know he's incongruous with me..." She tried to get along with her jealousy of this relationship through the shadowy world around her, but was it not until Shinobu MIDO, one of the 'Mido Brothers' known for her beauty and beauty, wanted to have her take an imitch!? Love stories where each straight idea crosses! (By Hour of Lunacy)
